name: Niki de St. Phalle
biography: Niki grew up in New York, visiting Greenwich, CT and France in the summers. She starts out her career as a fashion model, gracing the covers of several women's magazines. Niki begins to study art: painting and sculpture, later acting. She was inspired to create her first Nanas, the archetypal female figures for which she becomes famous, by a pregnant friend. In the early 1970s she begins to work on architectural projects, receiving commissions all over the world—Israel, Belgium, and Germany.
